official_title: A concurrent resolution requesting the President to return the enrolled bill (H.R. 7175) for the relief of the Woodstock Daily Sentinel, and providing for its reenrollment with a technical correction.

summary.text: Requests the President to return a specified enrolled bill providing for the relief of a named newspaper to the House of Representatives. Substitutes the Secretary of the Treasury for the Secretary of Defense in such bill.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution requesting the President to return the enrolled bill (H.R. 7175) for the relief of the Woodstock Daily Sentinel, and providing for its reenrollment with a technical correction.
